description: This file defines an interface class IOmiProxy in C++, which provides methods for managing crypted bundles and registering/unregistering error listeners, serving as a wrapper around an omi_dbus_api for simpler method calls and signal handling.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface class providing methods to mount/unmount crypted bundles and manage error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given container ID, filesystem, and config paths; outputs the bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle using its container ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback, returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters an error listener using its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
